message_1: In a beauty contest, there are 100 participants. Each participant is asked to choose a number between 0 and 100. The winner of the beauty contest is the person whose chosen number is closest to 2/3 of the average number chosen by all participants. If multiple participants are equidistant from this value, then the winner is chosen randomly among those participants. What number should a participant choose in order to have a maximum chance of winning the beauty contest?
